extension.author: Todor Iliev

extension.description:
ITPSubscribe plugin adds subscribtion form in your articles. It will help you to increase number of your subscribers.

Invest in the extension improvement and sponsor it via SMS or PayPal.

Subscribe for the newsletter to receive information about updates and new ITPrism extensions.

Please, vote for the extension on Joomla! Extensions Directory

field.name: position
field.label: Position
field.description: A position where you want to put the form.

field.name: bg
field.label: Background
field.description: The background of the div element.

field.name: rss
field.label: RSS Icon
field.description: A RSS icon.

field.name: top
field.label: Top position
field.description: A top position of the RSS icon.

field.name: left
field.label: Left position
field.description: A left position of the RSS icon.

field.name: rssLink
field.label: RSS URL
field.description: Your RSS feed url.

field.name: displayFeedburner
field.label: Display FeedBurner Form
field.description: Select 'Yes' if you want to display the FeedBurner form.

field.name: feedburner_uri
field.label: FeedBurner URI
field.description: Set your feedburner uri string ( last part of the url ). For example : http://feeds.feedburner.com/itprism - The uri is 'itprism'.

field.name: feedburner_l
field.label: Language
field.description: Form language

field.name: displayCustomForm
field.label: Display Custom Form
field.description: Select 'Yes' if you want to display the custom form.

field.name: customHtmlFormCode
field.label: HTML code
field.description: Put the HTML code of the additional form, and it will be displyed.

field.name: showInArticles
field.label: Show in articles
field.description: Display plugin content in view 'article'.

field.name: excludeArticles
field.label: Exclude articles
field.description: List of excluded articles divided by comma. You must enter the IDs of articles.

field.name: excludeCats
field.label: Exclude categories
field.description: List with excluded categories divided by comma. You must enter the IDs of categories.

field.name: includeArticles
field.label: Display in these articles
field.description: Displays the plugin content in these articles notwithstanding the exclusion settings. You must enter the IDs of articles.

field.name: k2DisplayInArticles
field.label: Display in articles
field.description: Setting this to true and the plugin content will be displayed on article page.

field.name: vmDisplayInDetails
field.label: Display in details
field.description: Setting this to true and the plugin content will be displayed on details page.

field.name: jeDisplayInEvents
field.label: Display in events
field.description: Display plugin content on event details page.

field.name: ebDisplayInEntry
field.label: Display in entry
field.description: Setting this to true and the plugin content will be displayed on entry page.

field.name: loadCss
field.label: Load style.css
field.description: The style.css is a file that contains position and some styles of the plugin. You can disable the file loading if you have your own styles.
